[id='connecting-to-s3']
= Connecting to Amazon S3

An integration can retrieve data from an Amazon S3 bucket or copy data into
an Amazon S3 bucket. To do this, you create an Amazon S3
connection and then add that Amazon S3 connection to an integration.
For details, see:

* <<prerequisites-for-creating-s3-connection>>
* <<create-s3-connection>>
* <<adding-s3-connections>>

include::prerequisites_for_creating_s3_connection.adoc[leveloffset=+1]

include::create_s3_connection.adoc[leveloffset=+1]

include::adding_s3_connections.adoc[leveloffset=+1]
